item.title: TechCrunch Tablet Prototype
item.description: TechCrunch shows off their second prototype, following Michael Arrington and company's challenge to come up with a $200 touch screen netbook tablet. Looks like the price would be closer to $300, but they're well on their way to proving the concept. http://www.techcrunch.com/2009/01/19/techcrunch-tablet-update-prototype-b/
